short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Excel Form – Easy Data Entry input with AutoComplete & DatePicker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of struggling with data entry?
Whether you’ve been searching for ways to create a form in Excel or
faced errors while trying to set it up, you know how frustrating
the process can be. Our Excel Form Extension offers an effortless,
time-saving solution that you’ve been looking for.

No more wasted time trying to figure out settings or dealing
with errors—this form is ready to go right inside your browser.
Simply upload your spreadsheet, and you’ll have access to a
streamlined input form, with autofill suggestions, date pickers,
and the convenience of switching between fields using keyboard
shortcuts. You can even search your table, edit or delete rows
with just a click, and download the updated file when you’re done.

Take control of your workflow with a form that’s simpler, faster,
and built to make data entry a breeze. Try it now, and see how easy your work can be.

This application is not affiliated with or endorsed by Microsoft. 
All trademarks, such as Excel, are the property of their respective owners.
